name: Dask skyd
description:
Only works on windows 7

Rent your equipment , greets the adventure and be cast into the fields of this new region full of tremendous struggle for survival enemigos.Una you espera.Recolecta breaks and currency and the dynamic fields cambiantes.Pero to succeed will have to complete missions and adapt to unexpected changes because time will not wait and your exploraciones.Mejora affect your ability to reach even further as enemies lurk , perseguen and attack mercilessly .

Main Features: - Adventure - Character with upgradeable skills. - Weapons of long, medium and short distance. - Objects regenerators, enhancers and inhibitors. - People with transformation. - Secondary and primary quests ( story). - Collection of resources.
